title: Jane Fonda | Amber's Minute of Fury: Jerome Adams, Surgeon General of the United States
description:
Late Night writer Amber Ruffin focuses a minute of fury on Jerome Adams, Surgeon General of the United States, for telling people of color to "step up" and take responsibility for keeping themselves healthy during the coronavirus pandemic.

Then, Seth talks to activist and Hollywood legend Jane Fonda.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
